author: mrmitch
title: update to old review
review: this bucket is ok with standard bricks. It has a total of 400 pcs, it is a combination of 4104 (200 pcs) and # 4782 (200 pcs) They actual bucket it comes in is labeled as# 4696 .  Hope this clears up any confusion about this tub.  Good set to build up your bulk bricks for freestyle building.
